data.name: GERONIMO
data.detailed_description:
Inspired by games such as: Ready or Not, Rainbow Six: Siege, CoD: Modern Warfare and Insurgency: Sandstorm. GERONIMO is a highly realistic, tactical and immersive CQB shooter that has been built from the ground up for Virtual Reality. Play Solo, or with your friends and carry out your operations through our Procedural Environments as well as Custom Built missions inspired by real world raids.




Breaching is a key feature in GERONIMO. A wide range of methods are available, one or more of which may be used in any given situation. Blow holes in walls, ceilings, and floors to create new entry points to barricaded compounds.

IMPROVISE, ADAPT, OVERCOME.




Experience the uncertainty of operating through a intelligent Procedural Mission generating system that re-shapes the battlefield each time you play. Every room, every building and every enemy changes each time.

THE ONLY EASY DAY WAS YESTERDAY.




Inspired by CoD: Modern Warfare missions such as "Clean House" and "Wolf's Den", GERONIMO brings an unpredictable dynamic A.I. to the game that enforces you to think, act and decide quickly because lives depend on it. The A.I. will hide in closets, beds and use every possible advantage they can get in a room. Barricaded shooters, MG nests settled down the hallway, Suicide bombers, everything is possible...

THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN BEING A COWARD AND A HERO IS NOT WHETHER YOU'RE SCARED, IT'S WHAT YOU DO WHILE YOU'RE SCARED.

data.short_description: GERONIMO is an immersive, tactical CQB shooter built for Virtual Reality that depicts a modern-day world in which Special Forces operators are called to implement unconventional operations as members of elite teams. Engage in the most realistic combat experience available. "Who Dares, Wins"

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-4770 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070

content_descriptors.notes: GERONIMO aims to bring a realistic experience of operating as a Special Forces member. This includes the depiction of frequent violence and gore.
